Description: Vintage 1970 JAPAN SEIKO 5 SPORTS SPEED-TIMER 6139-6031 21Jewels Automatic. Welcome to my auction! I am Japanese who live in Tokyo. Item description It's a SEIKO Automatic Watch, 5 SPORTS SPEED-TIMER 6139-6031 21Jewels . It's in good used condition. It's difficult to find this valuable watch in such a good condition. Highly recommended for SEIKO collectors! Movement : Pet name : 61 FIVE SPORTS SPEED-TIMER .Caliber : 6139A,B.Movement : Automatic.Beat rate : 21600bph.Manufacture Year : 1969's.Factory : Suwa.Externals : Serial number : 009702.Dial : No.JAPAN0 6139-6050T.Glass : Crystal.Case : Approximate Width-41mm(Excluding Crown).Lug width : 19mm.Band : New Leather Strap of SEIKO original.Condition : Used, it runs well.Function is good. Quick set(Day/Date) : Okay. Set the day of the week can be in English or Kanji. Set of the date: Press lightly on the crown. Set of the days of the week: Press strongly on the crown.Approximate Watch rate(Flat) : +4Sec/day．For practical, everyday use, it would be advisable to have the movement cleaned and oiled.
